name: Wages Of Fear
description:
Four desperate men sign on for a suicide mission to drive trucks loaded with nitroglycerin over treacherous roads. As they ferry their explosive cargo to a faraway oil fire, each bump and jolt tests their courage, their friendship, and their nerves.

Original game by : ZTEAM

 Plateform : OSX / Linux 64-bit / Windows 64-bit /  WebGL

 Game Design : Hugo

Music / Code : Dom

Release : 2021
